logger.doc:name: Before Backend Call
logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId]], correlationID: #[vars.correlationID], message: "Before document upload to S3", bucketName: #[vars.bucketName], keyPath: #[vars.keyPath]

logger.doc:name: After Backend Call
logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId]], correlationID: #[vars.correlationID], message: "After document upload to S3", payload: #[payload]
